column1: Chiniot-Faisalabad Campus
S
column2: ituated at the junction of Pakistan’s Textile Capital-Faisalabad and the historically rich city

column1: of Chiniot in suburbs of River Chenab, the Chiniot - Faisalabad campus is the 5th campus
of  the  university.  The  campus  symbolizes  the  desirable  connection  between  nature  and
industry and between tradition and modernity. Its picturesque surroundings in the outskirts
of Pakistan’s Manchester, the home to the textile industry, represent human advancement
from agrarian to industrial and technological society. Spanning around 30 acres along the
Faisalabad Sargodha Road, approximately 9 kilometers from the M4 Motorway interchange
towards Chiniot, this campus is a testament to academic excellence in both professional and
personal realms. Following in the footsteps of its esteemed sister campuses in Islamabad,
Lahore, Karachi, and Peshawar, graduates here are highly sought after by both national and
multinational corporations, with many holding prominent positions in renowned institutions
like Google, Facebook, and Microsoft.
F
column2: AST-NUCES Chiniot-Faisalabad is the first residential campus of the University offering

column1: Boys and Girls Hostel and allied facilities inside the campus. The campus is home to 1000+
boys  and  girls  residing  in  campus.  Offering  programs  in  Computer  Science,  Software
Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Electrical Engineering, and Business Administration,
the campus boasts a distinguished faculty dedicated to nurturing academic excellence. State-
of-the-art facilities, including advanced computing and engineering labs, provide students
with hands-on experience and a conducive learning environment.
M
column2: oreover, the campus has catalyzed Faisalabad's technological landscape, fostering a surge

column1: in technology startups. Its strategic proximity to leading industrial enterprises promises to
elevate  the  standard  of  professional  education  across  the  nation.  Beyond  academics,  the
campus  fosters  a  vibrant  student
competitions, and cultural events. From cricket to chess, students engage in a diverse array
of  activities  that  enrich  their  collegiate  experience.  The  campus  has  state  of  the  art
computing, engineering and other support facilities. Spacious and well-equipped computer
and engineering labs impart practical orientation to the students in their respective areas of

conducive, and constructive learning environment to the students.

column2: he Campus other than academics offer a very vibrant student life to contribute towards the

column1: personality development of the students. Extends sports facilities in both indoor and outdoor
games  like  cricket,  football,  badminton,  table  tennis,  volleyball,  basketball,  futsal,  and
chess. Besides sports, healthy competitions in the fields of information technology, business
and arts are frequently organized by the campus.
